00019 char* CryptoHandler::base64decode(unsigned char *input, int length)
00020 {
00021         BIO *b64, *bmem;
00022 
00023         char *buffer = (char *)malloc(length);
00024         memset(buffer, 0, length);
00025 
00026         b64 = BIO_new(BIO_f_base64());
00027         BIO_set_flags(b64, BIO_FLAGS_BASE64_NO_NL);
00028         bmem = BIO_new_mem_buf(input, length);
00029         bmem = BIO_push(b64, bmem);
00030 
00031         BIO_read(bmem, buffer, length);
00032 
00033         BIO_free_all(bmem);
00034 
00035         return buffer;
00036 }
00037 
00038 char* CryptoHandler::base64encode(const unsigned char *input, int length)
00039 {
00040         BIO *bmem, *b64;
00041         BUF_MEM *bptr;
00042 
00043         b64 = BIO_new(BIO_f_base64());
00044         bmem = BIO_new(BIO_s_mem());
00045         b64 = BIO_push(b64, bmem);
00046         BIO_write(b64, input, length);
00047         BIO_flush(b64);
00048         BIO_get_mem_ptr(b64, &bptr);
00049 
00050         char *buff = (char *)malloc(bptr->length);
00051         memcpy(buff, bptr->data, bptr->length-1);
00052         buff[bptr->length-1] = 0;
00053 
00054         BIO_free_all(b64);
00055 
00056         return buff;
00057 }

00059 char* CryptoHandler::hmac_sha1(char* datain,char* keyin,bool base64)
00060 {
00061         unsigned char* key = (unsigned char*) keyin;
00062         unsigned char* data = (unsigned char*) datain;
00063         unsigned char* result,*result1;
00064         unsigned int result_len = 20,result1_len;
00065 
00066         HMAC_CTX ctx;
00067         result = (unsigned char*) malloc(sizeof(char) * result_len);
00068 
00069         ENGINE_load_builtin_engines();
00070         ENGINE_register_all_complete();
00071 
00072         HMAC_CTX_init(&ctx);
00073         HMAC_Init_ex(&ctx, key, strlen(keyin), EVP_sha1(), NULL);
00074         HMAC_Update(&ctx, data, strlen(datain));
00075         HMAC_Final(&ctx, result, &result_len);
00076         HMAC_CTX_cleanup(&ctx);
00077 
00078         //HMAC(EVP_sha1(),key,strlen(keyin),data,strlen(datain),result,&result_len);
00079         if(base64)
00080                 return base64encode(result,result_len);
00081         return (char*)result;
00082 }

00096

00157 string CryptoHandler::urlDecode(string str)
00158 {
00159         string strret = str;
00160         boost::replace_all(strret,"%25","%");
00161         boost::replace_all(strret,"%3D","=");
00162         boost::replace_all(strret,"%3A",":");
00163         boost::replace_all(strret,"%20"," ");
00164         boost::replace_all(strret,"%5E","^");
00165         boost::replace_all(strret,"%26","&");
00166         boost::replace_all(strret,"%60","`");
00167         boost::replace_all(strret,"%7B","{");
00168         boost::replace_all(strret,"%7D","}");
00169         boost::replace_all(strret,"%7C","|");
00170         boost::replace_all(strret,"%5D","]");
00171         boost::replace_all(strret,"%5B","[");
00172         boost::replace_all(strret,"%22","\"");
00173         boost::replace_all(strret,"%3C","<");
00174         boost::replace_all(strret,"%3E",">");
00175         boost::replace_all(strret,"%5C","\\");
00176         boost::replace_all(strret,"%23","#");
00177         boost::replace_all(strret,"%3F","?");
00178         boost::replace_all(strret,"%2F","/");
00179         boost::replace_all(strret,"%2B","+");
00180         return strret;
00181 }

00183 string CryptoHandler::urlEncode(string str)
00184 {
00185         string strret;
00186         int len = str.length();
00187         for(int i=0; i<len; i++)
00188         {
00189                 switch(str[i])
00190                 {
00191                 case '%':
00192                         strret.append("%25");
00193                         break;
00194                 case '=':
00195                         strret.append("%3D");
00196                         break;
00197                 case ':':
00198                         strret.append("%3A");
00199                         break;
00200                 case ' ':
00201                         strret.append("%20");
00202                         break;
00203                 case '^':
00204                         strret.append("%5E");
00205                         break;
00206                 case '&':
00207                         strret.append("%26");
00208                         break;
00209                 case '`':
00210                         strret.append("%60");
00211                         break;
00212                 case '{':
00213                         strret.append("%7B");
00214                         break;
00215                 case '}':
00216                         strret.append("%7D");
00217                         break;
00218                 case '|':
00219                         strret.append("%7C");
00220                         break;
00221                 case ']':
00222                         strret.append("%5D");
00223                         break;
00224                 case '[':
00225                         strret.append("%5B");
00226                         break;
00227                 case '"':
00228                         strret.append("%22");
00229                         break;
00230                 case '<':
00231                         strret.append("%3C");
00232                         break;
00233                 case '>':
00234                         strret.append("%3E");
00235                         break;
00236                 case '\\':
00237                         strret.append("%5C");
00238                         break;
00239                 case '#':
00240                         strret.append("%23");
00241                         break;
00242                 case '?':
00243                         strret.append("%3F");
00244                         break;
00245                 case '/':
00246                         strret.append("%2F");
00247                         break;
00248                 case '+':
00249                         strret.append("%2B");
00250                         break;
00251                 default:
00252                         strret.push_back(str[i]);
00253                         break;
00254                 }
00255         }
00256         return strret;
00257 }
